name: APES: Alien Prison Escape Ship
description:
Alien Prisoner Escape Ship is a game developed in Puzzle Script for the Big Scary Game Jam. The game puts you in the role of a mechanic on board an alien prisoner ship. Soon you realize there is an escape and in an effort to get to the escape pod you have to decide to maintain the peace or save yourself. Music in the game is being streamed from youtube on this link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=goIjV1BgPog

Hope you enjoy it.
